channel.title: CVE Feed for MOXA -- UC-8580 Series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MOXA -- UC-8580 Series

item.title: CVE-2023-1257|2024-08-02T05:40:59.879Z -- moxa -- uc-8580%20series
item.description: An attacker with physical access to the affected Moxa UC Series devices can initiate a restart of the device and gain access to its BIOS. Command line options can then be altered, allowing the attacker to access the terminal. From the terminal, the attacker can modify the deviceâ€™s authentication files to create a new user and gain full access to the system.
